attributes.action: Stop the clocks going back 1 hour on Sunday, 25 October, 2020
attributes.additional_details: Stop the clocks going back on Sunday, 25 October, 2020
attributes.background: Request to the UK Government to stop the clocks going back 1 hour on Sunday, 25 October. Reason: the entire population of the UK does not need nor want a single hour more of  the year 2020

rejection.details: We're sorry we didn't get to your petition before the clocks went back, but there is already a petition on this issue: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321333
